mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number, nick_name, password, dob, create_time, is_delete, gender) values (#{userId}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{nickName}, #{password}, #{dob}, #{createTime}, #{isDelete}, #{gender})
mapper.update: update user set user_id = #{userId}, first_name = #{firstName}, last_name = #{lastName}, email = #{email}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, nick_name = #{nickName}, password = #{password}, dob = #{dob}, create_time = #{createTime}, is_delete = #{isDelete}, gender = #{gender}
